name: copy-aws-architecture-icon
title: Copy AWS Architecture Icon
description: Copy AWS architecture icons in PNG or SVG format to the clipboard.
author: yucchi-p

commands.name: search-aws-icons
commands.title: Search AWS Icons
commands.subtitle: Search AWS Icons
commands.description: Search AWS Icons from AWS Architecture Icons

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
